Label.en: It's cool that you found the typing bar, but if you want, you can use the quick replies
Label.fr: By the way, I can understand some humanspeak, but not all...
Label.es: By the way, I can understand some humanspeak, but not all...

Label.en: It's faster, and I'll understand you much better!
Label.fr: Try using the quick replies to respond instead!
Label.es: Try using the quick replies to respond instead!
